report.name: facintg2

userParameter.name: P_WHERE
userParameter.initialValue: from synthese_fin sf, client_mo cli, ligne_bip bip, centre_activite ca, datdebex d, dossier_projet dosp, proj_info pi where bip.PID = sf.PID and bip.CLICODE = cli.CLICODE and sf.CODCAMO = ca.CODCAMO and sf.ANNEE = to_char(d.MOISMENS,'YYYY') AND bip.dpcode = dosp.dpcode and bip.icpi||'' = pi.ICPI and sf.CADA = pi.CADA
userParameter.label: P Where

dataSource.name: Q_MoisAn
dataSource.select: select to_char(:p_MoisConso) || '/' || to_char(:p_AnConso) dc_mois, :p_AnConso dc_an, (:p_AnConso - 1) dc_dec from dual;

dataSource.name: Q_facintg2
dataSource.select: select 'pagef', 'pageg', SUBSTR(cli.CLISIGLE,1,4) dc_directionf, sf.CODCAMO dc_capayeur, sf.CAFI dc_cafi, bip.dpcode dc_codedossf, bip.astatut dc_statut, decode(bip.astatut,'A',1,0) dc_statutA, dosp.dplib dc_dossprojf, bip.icpi dc_icpif, pi.ilibel dc_icpi_lib, pi.cada dc_cada, cli.CLISIGLE dc_mof, bip.PID dc_pidf, SUBSTR(bip.pnom,1,28) dc_libellef, bip.METIER || '-' || pack_utile.f_get_deppole_codsg( sf.CODSG ) dc_dpgf, round(sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOJHSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOJHSSII_IM,0)),2) dc_jh_moisf, round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOJHSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOJHSSII_IM,0)),2) dc_jh_anf, round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) dc_conso_anf, round(sum(nvl(sf.A_CONSOFT_IM,0))/1000,2) dc_rectif_moisf, round(sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) dc_factint_moisf &P_WHERE group by SUBSTR(cli.CLISIGLE,1,4), sf.CODCAMO, sf.CAFI, bip.dpcode, bip.astatut, decode(bip.astatut,'A',1,0), dosp.dplib, bip.icpi, pi.ilibel, pi.cada, cli.CLISIGLE, bip.PID, SUBSTR(bip.pnom,1,28), bip.METIER || '-' || pack_utile.f_get_deppole_codsg( sf.CODSG ) having round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOJHSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOJHSSII_IM,0)),2) <>0 or round(sum(nvl(sf.A_CONSOFT_IM,0))/1000,2) <> 0 or round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) <>0 or round(sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) <>0 order by dc_directionf, dc_mof, dc_codedossf, dc_dossprojf, dc_icpif, dc_cafi, dc_pidf, dc_statutA, dc_statut ;

dataDescriptor.expression: round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.M_CONSOJHSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOJHSSII_IM , 0 ) ) , 2 )
round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.CONSOJHSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOJHSSII_IM , 0 ) ) , 2 )
round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000 , 2 )
round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSSII_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000 , 2 )

dataSource.name: Q_Direction
dataSource.select: select substr(cli.clisigle,1,4) dc_direction, round(sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOJHSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOJHSSII_IM,0)),2) dc_dir_jh_moisf, round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOJHSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOJHSSII_IM,0)),2) dc_dir_jh_anf, round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) dc_dir_conso_anf, round(sum(nvl(sf.A_CONSOFT_IM,0))/1000,2) dc_dir_rectif_moisf, round(sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) dc_dir_factint_moisf &P_WHERE group by substr(cli.clisigle,1,4) having round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOJHSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOJHSSII_IM,0)),2) <>0 or round(sum(nvl(sf.A_CONSOFT_IM,0))/1000,2) <> 0 or round(sum(nvl(sf.CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) <>0 or round(sum(nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSG_IM,0) + nvl(sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_IM,0))/1000,2) <>0 order by dc_direction;

dataDescriptor.expression: round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.M_CONSOJHSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOJHSSII_IM , 0 ) ) , 2 )
round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.CONSOJHSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOJHSSII_IM , 0 ) ) , 2 )
round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.CONSOFTSSII_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000 , 2 )
round ( sum ( nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSG_IM , 0 ) + nvl ( sf.M_CONSOFTSSII_IM , 0 ) ) / 1000 , 2 )

textSegment.string: Total activit en cours - DP n &F_dc_codedoss
Total gnral du Dossier Projet n &F_dc_codedoss
Attention : Primtre trop grand veuiller contacter la MO BIP
Cette dition est le reflet de la situation ce jour

function.name: cf_rectif_moisfformula
afterpform

cf_1formula
